page.title: 06A DAY IN MR COLE'S LIFE.
page.content: { MR. COLE'S DAY My dad gets up at 7.00a.m. and at 7.20 he drives by car to Hinkley Point.He has to walk through a turn stile to get inside. He changes into his working clothes and with his bag of tools goes to the turbine hall to mend the machines. The machines are very big and weigh about 50 elephants.At about 10.00 he stops for a cup of tea. Then he works until 12.30. when he has his sandwiches, cheese is his favourite. In the afternoon he carries on mending the machines using the crane for heavy things. At about 4.30 he gets washed and changed and goes home for tea. After tea he does some decorating. About 9.00 he has a cup of coffee and watches television then at 11.00 he goes to bed. {by HAYLEY COLES.
